item.title: Protocol 2023-W48: Base Building
item.description:
ğŸ“… Weekly Schedule

Day Type Workout
Friday Run 4 miles at Zone 2 (HR <150)
Saturday Brick + Content Creation 30-minute bike + 20-minute run, followed by 1 hour of content creation (Twitter thread or blog post)
Sunday Long Run 6 miles at Zone 2 (HR <150)

ğŸ¯ Training Goals

  • Build a solid aerobic base in swimming and cycling
  • Maintain running endurance while transitioning to triathlon
  • Preserve strength PRs (300 lb deadlift, 225 lb squat)

ğŸš€ Startup Goals

  • Complete core features for MVP
  • Begin beta testing with 5 users
  • Document progress and lessons learned in a blog post

item.title: Protocol 2023-W01: Base Building
item.description:
ğŸ“… Weekly Schedule

Day Type Workout
Monday Recovery Rest or light stretching/yoga (30 min)
Tuesday Swim 800m swim with technique drills (focus on breathing and form)
Wednesday Bike 30 min bike + 20 min run + content creation session (1 hour)
Thursday Strength Lower body: Deadlift 3x5, Squat 3x5, Leg Press 3x10
Friday Run 4 miles easy run (HR <150)
Saturday Brick 60 min indoor trainer, focus on cadence (85-95 RPM)
Sunday Long Run 6 miles easy run (HR <150)

ğŸ¯ Training Goals

  • Establish a consistent swim routine focusing on technique
  • Build a solid cycling base with proper form and cadence
  • Maintain running endurance without increasing intensity
  • Preserve compound lift strength (300 lb deadlift, 225 lb squat)

ğŸš€ Startup Goals

  • Complete core features of MVP by January 2026
  • Acquire 10 beta users by February 2026
  • Generate first $1 in revenue by February 2026

ğŸ“Š Weekly Targets

Cardio Volume:
